description: An immersive exploration of visual storytelling, this piece takes viewers through an emotional journey, revealing the subtle interplay between motion, sound, and narrative. It reflects on the fragility of memory and the power of visual composition to evoke deep emotional responses.
title: Bolt in Batumi

description: Set in the bustling streets of a vibrant city, this video captures the essence of daily life from a poetic perspective. With slow motion sequences and a hauntingly beautiful soundtrack, it invites us to pause and consider the rhythm of the world around us.
title: Teaser - Gorgiladze’s Unbearable Lightness of Being

description: A conceptual video that blends experimental visuals with ambient audio textures. It challenges conventional storytelling by immersing the viewer in a dreamlike atmosphere where the boundaries of time and space feel blurred.
title: TRIPTYCHOS

description: Through a lens of abstract movement and minimalist sound design, this film explores the concept of personal transformation. It invites the audience to reflect on change not as a sudden shift, but as a series of subtle evolutions.
title: World Health Organization - HPV Vaccine

description: A quiet and introspective visual essay on solitude and the human connection to nature. Long, meditative shots capture the gentle dance of wind through trees and the shifting light of dusk, offering a sense of serenity and grounding.
title: International Day of the Girl Child - UNFPA

description: This narrative piece weaves a tale of resilience through the eyes of a young artist. Using a rich visual palette and dynamic cinematography, it highlights the internal struggles and external triumphs that define the creative process.
title: Circus Mircus - Sakartvelo

description: A celebration of kinetic energy and urban culture, this video pulses with rhythm and style. It’s a tribute to street dance, filmed in evocative lighting and accompanied by a beat-driven score that elevates every frame.
title: USAID  - Extraordinary Exhibition

description: A surreal dive into memory and imagination, using layers of analog textures and nonlinear editing to evoke the fragmented way we recall the past. It plays with perception and emotion, creating a hypnotic audiovisual experience.
title: NAPOLI

description: Filmed across remote landscapes, this video presents a visual meditation on isolation and natural beauty. With minimal narration, it relies on striking visuals and ambient field recordings to transport the viewer to untouched places.
title: Mosaics in Samegrelo

description: A high-energy montage that captures the spirit of collaboration in the arts. Featuring a diverse group of creators, the piece emphasizes the synergy that emerges when visionaries come together across disciplines.
title: No Man's Sky: Braiding Sweetgrass

description: An ode to craftsmanship and tradition, this short documentary delves into the life of an artisan whose work spans decades. Through detailed close-ups and patient storytelling, it honors the beauty of skill passed through generations.
title: Letter to Santa

description: Structured like a visual poem, this experimental piece deconstructs light and shadow, movement and stillness. Each frame is a standalone painting in motion, encouraging reflection and interpretation.
title: MenCare - Father's Day 2022

description: A fast-paced travel log filled with vivid color and dynamic cuts, offering a window into unfamiliar cultures and stunning landscapes. It combines personal narration with spontaneous visuals to bring the journey to life.
title: 60 Seconds Challenge - UNDP

description: A cinematic tribute to youth and freedom, filmed with a nostalgic lens. The visuals carry a warmth and softness that echo childhood memories and fleeting summers spent exploring the world.
title: Tamam Abulova

description: This immersive short captures the tension between digital connectivity and emotional isolation. It uses a blend of screen recordings, staged interactions, and ambient textures to create a compelling social commentary.
title: Winglet Holiday

description: With a focus on environmental themes, this video pairs poetic voiceover with sweeping nature footage. It’s a contemplative call to awareness about our relationship with the Earth and the responsibilities that come with it.
title: Crowne Plaza

description: Shot over several months, this time-lapse project reveals the beauty hidden in everyday moments. It emphasizes how change, imperceptible in the moment, becomes profound when viewed over time.
title: Samzadisi

description: A kinetic dance piece where movement and cinematography are perfectly synchronized. The video explores space, gravity, and tension through precise choreography and camera motion.
title: Window Project: Sigmar Polke

description: A whimsical animation that tells the story of a curious traveler navigating a surreal world. It blends hand-drawn style with digital effects to create a playful, immersive experience.
title: Free & Agri Universities Promo - 2016

description: Through powerful imagery and intimate sound design, this video captures the internal landscape of grief and healing. Each scene is a quiet testament to resilience and the slow return to hope.
title: Persona

description: A minimalist piece centered around light, shape, and silence. It’s a meditative film where small shifts in tone and movement hold deep symbolic weight.
title: BSE Program - Free University of Tbilisi

description: A character-driven story told entirely through visuals and score. The absence of dialogue allows the emotions of the protagonist to speak through subtle facial expressions and carefully composed shots.
title: Ultrabiotique

description: This experimental short fuses 3D motion graphics with documentary footage to explore the concept of dual realities—how we present ourselves online versus who we are offline.
title: Positive Discrimination - UNDP

description: A study of motion in natural elements—wind, water, fire—blended together with a haunting soundtrack. The visuals flow seamlessly into one another, crafting a story without words.
title: Window Project: Shotiko Aptsiauri - Waterless Swimming

description: This visual narrative follows the rebuilding of a community after disaster. It emphasizes human resilience through close-up portraits and scenes of restoration, reminding us of the collective strength we share.
title: Luna

description: A high-contrast black-and-white short focused on architecture and geometry. It highlights the artistry hidden in the lines and curves of our built environments.
title: Free & Agri Universities Promo - 2018

description: Set to a minimalist piano score, this video is a meditation on stillness. It invites viewers to slow down and appreciate the subtle interplay between light and form.
title: Father's Day 2021

description: Combining abstract visual loops with generative audio, this piece exists at the intersection of code and creativity. It’s a digital art experiment designed to mesmerize.
title: Father's Day 2021

description: A poetic exploration of memory and identity, told through layered visuals and symbolic motifs. The film leans into ambiguity, letting viewers draw their own meanings.
title: Father's Day 2021

description: This short focuses on water as a metaphor for emotion. Through macro shots and slow pans, it reveals how something so familiar can feel mysterious when seen through a different lens.
title: Father's Day 2020

description: A documentary-style video about a musician creating soundscapes in nature. It highlights the harmony between man and environment, celebrating creative improvisation.
title: Stand for Human Rights

description: The final entry in this collection is a hauntingly beautiful visual tone poem, lingering on faces, empty spaces, and the unsaid. It asks the viewer not to watch, but to feel.
title: The March of 1000 Parents
